item.title: Big Mountain - Baby I Love Your Way
item.description:
Ooh baby I love
your way everyday
Ooh baby I love
your way everyday
Shadow grow so long
before my eyes
And they’re moving
across the page
Suddenly the day
turns into night
Far away
from the city
But don’t
oh no hesitate
‘Cause your love
just won’t wait yeah-
Ooh baby I love
your way everyday-
I wanna
tell you
I love your way
everyday yeah-
I wanna be with you
night and day
The Moon appears
to shine
And light the sky
with the help
Of some fireflies
I wonder how they have
The power to
shine shine shine
Well I can see them
under the pine
But don’t
oh no no hesitate
‘Cause your love
just won’t wait yeah-

your way everyday-

tell you

everyday yeah-
I wanna be with you
night and day

everyday-
I will love
I will love-
I love your way
oh baby please
I can see the sunset
in your eyes
Brown and grey
and blue besides
Clouds are stalking
islands in the Sun
I wish I could buy one
out of season
But don’t
oh no no hesitate
‘Cause your love
just won’t wait
